questions.quote: It's a par five. So you know I step up to the tee and I hit a beautiful drive right down the middle of the fairway. I mean you know my hook, right?
I heard what happened to the junior high. They can't bump you like that. That is so unprofessional.
Also endowed. George... I know how much Susan meant to you. It can't be easy.
So, then you asked yourselves, "Isn't there something more to life?"
That's what you had to tell me? Your father wears sneakers in the pool?
Costanza, you may be my only friend around here. By the way, you got that birthday card?
I didn't take the subway all the way to New York to sit at a table like that!
'Dear Barry. Consider this letter to be official termination of our relationship effective immediately.'
I need like a bucket of water! I got a car overheating, I got an alarm that won't go off, I'm pressing 'one', I'm pressing 'two', nothing! What do I do?! Help me! Help me!
See, so I don't know if I got a funeral 'hello' or he was mad because he didn't get his day-after 'thank you'.
